name: NETXP LINUX dbus-send and gdbus Invocations:
description: Monitors dbus-send and gdbus invocations, which may indicate privilege escalation. These commands are associated with D-Bus, and their execution might suggest attempts to manipulate or control inter-process communication, potentially leading to privilege escalation.
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
//any where (auditd.log.key: "dbus_send" or auditd.log.key: "gdubs_call") and

any where event.module: "auditd"
